phrs.translation: 阴霾, 魔影, 幽灵, 恐惧
恐怖之源, 力量幽灵, 之源
黑暗幽灵, 鬼影魔神
布罗肯幽灵, 布罗肯宝光
杰克·斯佩克特, 斯佩克特, 艺术与精神分析

sentences.sentence: I could point at all those layoff statistics. Or I could frighten you by bringing up the specter of your job going overseas.
sentences.translation: 我可以指出所有那些裁员的数据。或者，我可以提出你去海外工作这一幽灵来吓唬你。

sentences.sentence: This raises the specter of director over-commitment and the resultant dilution of contribution.
sentences.translation: 这引发了董事过度承诺以及由此导致的出资额稀释的担忧。

sentences.sentence: Hypnotic Specter seems a lot better than this to me.
sentences.translation: 催眠幽灵看起来比他好多了。
